Organization Name: NORTH EAST EMERGENCY DISTRIBUTION (NEED) | NEED EAST | HEB TRANSIT PASSES
Description: Provides transit passes for the residents to access destinations for employment or seeking employment in HEB.

Organization Name: 6 STONES MISSION NETWORK | MAIN OFFICE | HEB TRANSIT
Description: Participates as a low cost transportation provider for disadvantaged residents in (HEB) Hurst, Euless and Bedford and in the TRE stations at Hurst (Bell) and CentrePort. Provides access to destinations which may include work or work-related activities, job interviews, training, education and childcare.

Organization Name: CHRISTIAN CONNECTION | MAIN OFFICE | HEB TRANSIT
Description: Provides transportation for disadvantaged residents in Hurst, Euless and Bedford to access destinations that are employment related in the Hurst, Euless, and Bedford (HEB).**This includes the TRE Bell Station in Hurst and CentrePort, also includes businesses in Precinct 1 & 2 of Tarrant County (partially into the surrounding communities of HEB).

Organization Name: TRINITY METRO | MAIN OFFICE | CROWLEY ZIPZONE
Description: Provides transportation to medical facilities and shopping options in the city as well as connections to four bus routes in Fort Worth, plus the South Park & Ride. Will include service to Texas Health Huguley Hospital Fort Worth South and the Gateway Station shopping center.
